Title: Relates to eligibility of federal employees and contractors for unemployment insurance benefits
Summary: Relates to eligibility of federal employees and contractors for unemployment insurance benefits; applies to any employee or contractor who is a resident of New York state and required to work as a United States government employee or contractor without compensation during a covered lapse in appropriations by the United States government that begins on or after December 22, 2018.
LawCode: Amd ยง591, add ยง591-b, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to unemployment benefits for qualified individuals during certain lapses in appropriations by the United States government
